Uses of Package
Models

Packages that use Models
Package
Description
CommonFunctions
This package consists of all CommonFunctions classes.
Controllers
This package consists of all Controllers classes.
Models
This package consists of all Models classes.
Services
This package consists of all Services classes.
Views
This package consists of all Views classes.
  • Classes in Models used by CommonFunctions
    Class
    Description
    GameState
    This class is used to test functionality of GameState class functions.
  • Classes in Models used by Controllers
    Class
    Description
    GamePlayPhase
    This abstract class lists the methods required for all game phases.

    This class is used to test functionality of GameState class functions.
  • Classes in Models used by Models
    Class
    Description
    Card
    This model class oversees the player's card ownership and management.
    Continent
    This model class manages all the Continents in the map.
    Country
    This model class manages all the countries on the map.
    GamePlayPhase
    This abstract class lists the methods required for all game phases.
    GameState
    This class is used to test functionality of GameState class functions.
    IssueOrderPhase
    Implementation of the Issue Order Phase for GamePlay using the State Pattern.
    Map
    this model class manages all the maps.
    Order
    The Command pattern's implementation: This model class is responsible for handling and overseeing the orders issued by players.
    Player
    This model class manages all the players in the game.
    PlayerBehaviorStrategy
    This is Player Behavior's abstract strategy class.
